experiences.title: Science Research Specialist
experiences.company: National Fisheries Research and Development Institute
experiences.location: Brackishwater Fisheries Research and Development Center
experiences.description: Working as a Science Research Specialist at the National Fisheries Research and Development Institute focusing on brackishwater fisheries research.
achievements: Contributing to fisheries research and development initiatives
Implementing research methodologies in brackishwater ecosystems
Analyzing data and preparing scientific reports
Collaborating with research teams on fisheries studies

experiences.title: Communications and Programs Intern
experiences.description: Participated in the Team KIKO Internship Program, focusing on communications and program implementation.
achievements: Assisted in developing communication materials and strategies
Gained experience in communications and program management

experiences.title: Bachelor of Science in Fisheries
experiences.description: Earned a Bachelor of Science in Fisheries degree with Cum Laude honors.
achievements: Conducted research on fisheries and aquatic resources
Developed expertise in fisheries management and research

experiences.title: Senior High School
experiences.description: Completed Senior High School education with High Honors.
achievements: Participated in academic competitions and extracurricular activities

research.title: Broodstock Development and Hatchery Production of Giant Freshwater Prawn
research.description: Research on giant freshwater prawn hatchery production and broodstock development techniques.

research.title: Abundance and Distribution of Bivalve Species in Shellfish Culture Systems
research.description: Research on bivalve species distribution and abundance in various shellfish culture systems.

research.title: Fish Right: Support Creation of Industry Fish Sourcing Guide Through Establishment of Length-Weight Relationship of Selected Species at North Visayan Sea
research.description: Development of fish sourcing guide based on length-weight relationships of selected marine species.
